title: You could think through this with Claude, not just get an answer
detail: Claude doesn't have to be an answer machine. You can use it as a thinking partnerâ€”someone to explore ideas with, surface considerations you missed, and help you reason through complexity. The goal isn't always an answer; sometimes it's clarity.
